title: MessageStructure
description: This type represents a generic message structure associated with the VDV463.

items.description: This type represents the message type.
This type represents the source of the data of the message.
This type represents an unique identifier for the presystemId according to RFC3986.
This type represents the current timestamp of the message.
This type represents the unique identifier of the message.
This type represents the action of the message.
This type represents the payload of the message which is specified in separate JSON schemas.
